marklogic.body:
Kudos to Gen. VK Singh to speak about kickback at lower levels. He is a brave soldier who breaks away fromÂ all the pressure put on General by kickback regime and media in control of bjp-congress cartel to continue their regime of kickbacks. they first pressured him on already Resolved issues like DOB. Now the real diversion is from Bajwa was wants Rahul as the PM. why is he using skum Rahul Fake Gandhi as scare crow. we all know that nation is run by Super PMs, scare crows and innocent thugs. All after these traitors like Bajwa, dhawan, etc stabbed PVNR on behalf of videshi kickback agents and brokers to plant Sonia.
MMS tell the BJP-congress cartel, we are getting too much Heat on Lanka fumble and corruption, our media cannot divert it. GET THAT JOKE PAL Anna hazare team of thugs.
